data.comment: The big names in today's match at Stade Louis II have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Reims.
Free kick for Reims in their own half.
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Monaco in the half of Reims.
Can Reims get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monaco's half?
Reims's El Bilal Toure has run offside.
Monaco pushes forward through Keita Balde, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Anastasios Donis gets his shot on target but fails to score for Reims.
Reims needs to be cautious. Monaco have an attacking throw-in.
Reims to take a throw-in in Monaco territory.
Free kick Reims.
Reims are coming forward and Hassane Kamara gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fontvieille.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Monaco apply pressure at Stade Louis II and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Keita Balde but the strike hits the bar!
Monaco's Keita Balde breaks free at Stade Louis II. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Reims have a goal kick.
In Fontvieille a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Monaco goal kick.
Throw-in for Reims at Stade Louis II.
Throw-in for Monaco in the half of Reims.
Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a Reims throw-in in Monaco's half.
Throw-in for Reims close to the penalty box.
Thomas Foket (Reims) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Anastasios Donis of Reims smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Reims in their own half.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
Free kick for Reims in their own half.
Goal kick for Monaco at Stade Louis II.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
An attacking Monaco player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Reims's Thomas Foket has been booked in Fontvieille.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead thanks to a penalty from Wissam Ben Yedder.
Free kick for Reims in the half of Monaco.
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards Monaco a goal kick.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a Reims throw-in in Monaco's half.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Reims in their own half.
Throw-in for Monaco in the half of Reims.
Throw-in for Reims in their own half.
Reims are whistled for offside.
Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
Reims have a dangerous throw-in.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
Free kick Monaco.
Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Reims's half?
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Reims.
Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
Reims to take a throw-in in Monaco territory.
Monaco's Keita Balde is on target but unsuccessful.
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards Reims a goal kick.
Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Reims awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Monaco to take a throw-in in Reims territory.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fontvieille.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Throw-in Reims.
In Fontvieille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Reims's Anastasios Donis misses with an attempt on goal.
Monaco have a goal kick.
Throw-in Monaco.
Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Reims's half?
Free kick Reims.
Ball goes out of play for a Monaco goal kick.
Reims push forward at Stade Louis II and Hassane Kamara gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Monaco defence.
Reims have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
Free kick for Reims in the half of Monaco.
Keita Balde for Monaco has been booked by Hakim Ben el Hadj and receives a first yellow card.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a Monaco throw-in in Reims's half.
Throw-in for Monaco in the half of Reims.
Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Reims in their own half.
Can Reims capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Monaco's half?
Goal! Hassane Kamara levels the match at 1-1.
Great play from Ghislain Konan to set up the goal.
In Fontvieille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Monaco.
Free kick for Reims in their own half.
Reims drives forward and Hassane Kamara gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
Goal kick for Reims at Stade Louis II.
Free kick for Reims in their own half.
Stevan Jovetic is replacing Keita Balde for Monaco at Stade Louis II.
Reims advance rapidly upfield but Hakim Ben el Hadj blows for offside.
Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team have replaced El Bilal Toure with Boulaye Dia. This is the first substitution made today by David Guion.
Throw-in high up the field for Monaco in Fontvieille.
Aleksandr Golovin (Monaco) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
At Stade Louis II, Reims are penalized for being offside.
Monaco awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Reims at Stade Louis II.
Free kick in a good position for Monaco!
Alaixys Romao (Reims) gets a yellow card.
Reims's Hassane Kamara is on target but unsuccessful.
Hassane Kamara (Reims) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Reims's Tristan Dingome gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Monaco at Stade Louis II.
Corner awarded to Reims.
In Fontvieille, Yunis Abdelhamid (Reims) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Reims in their own half.
Robert Moreno (Monaco) is making a second substitution, with Aurelien Tchouameni replacing Tiemoue Bakayoko.
Can Reims get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monaco's half?
Monaco push forward at Stade Louis II and Youssouf Fofana gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Reims defence.
Important block from the Reims defence as Islam Slimani fires in a strike for Monaco.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fontvieille.
David Guion is making the team's second substitution at Stade Louis II with Moussa Doumbia replacing Anastasios Donis.
Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
Aurelien Tchouameni (Monaco) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Reims in the half of Monaco.
Throw-in for Monaco at Stade Louis II.
Aleksandr Golovin of Monaco smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Reims drive upfield and Hassane Kamara gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Monaco defender.
Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
Monaco drives forward and Stevan Jovetic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Marshall Munetsi (Reims) has received a yellow card from Hakim Ben el Hadj.
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards the home team a throw-in.
David Guion (Reims) is making a third substitution, with Arber Zeneli replacing Tristan Dingome.
Monaco's Aurelien Tchouameni gets in a shot on goal at Stade Louis II. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Reims in their own half.
Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a throw-in for Reims, close to Monaco's area.
Free kick for Reims in their own half.
Hakim Ben el Hadj will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Reims are pushing forward but Boulaye Dia's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Monaco goal kick.
Islam Slimani for Monaco gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Reims have a goal kick.
Monaco pushes forward through [47], whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
Stevan Jovetic (Monaco) shoots â€“ and rattles the crossbar!
Islam Slimani of Monaco is pulled up for offside.
Monaco awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Monaco.
That's full-time at Stade Louis II. The final score is 1-1.
